sourcesContent:
export const theme = {
  primary: '#ffffff',
  secondary: '#b3b3b3',
  accent: '#64ffda', // Teal accent commonly used in tech portfolios
  background: '#0a192f', // Dark navy background
  cardBackground: '#112240', // Slightly lighter navy for cards
  text: '#8892b0', // Muted text for descriptions
  lightGray: '#ccd6f6', // Light gray for headings
  darkGray: '#233554', // Darker blue-gray for borders/elements
  gradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #0a192f 0%, #112240 100%)',
  shadow: '0 10px 30px -15px rgba(2, 12, 27, 0.7)',
  transition: 'all 0.25s cubic-bezier(0.645, 0.045, 0.355, 1)',
  borderRadius: '4px',
  navHeight: '100px',
  navScrollHeight: '70px',
  fontPrimary: "'Calibre', 'Inter', 'San Francisco', 'SF Pro Text', -apple-system, system-ui, sans-serif",
  fontMono: "'SF Mono', 'Fira Code', 'Fira Mono', 'Roboto Mono', monospace",
};
